subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals
description_text:
Hello simsonn

I am looking to buy the Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals but I have a some question. What is the maximum pressure the brake pedal can be used ad? And what does it mean when you say “Maximum sensor sensing value: 20kg” ?

Best regards Søren-Emil Meng

conversations.body_text: Hi Søren-Emil Meng,  The sensor has a 200kg range. If Simsonn Manager shows a real-time value of 20kg, it means the pedal was pressed with a force of 20kg at that moment. You can recalibrate the pedals according to your own force and preference.
